statements: SELECT borrower_id, name, address, phone_number FROM borrower_info;
SELECT name, phone_number, address, borrower_id FROM borrower_info;
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM borrower_info WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT borrower_id, address FROM borrower_info WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM borrower_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890' AND address = '123 Main St';
SELECT borrower_id, name FROM borrower_info WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT borrower_id, address FROM borrower_info WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY borrower_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrower_personal_information;
SELECT name, address FROM borrower_personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loan_details ORDER BY loan_approval_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, loan_amount FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM borrower_personal_information WHERE address LIKE '%Road%';
SELECT * FROM borrower_personal_information;
SELECT name, address FROM borrower_personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, name FROM borrower_personal_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_approval_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_personal_information.name, loan_details.loan_amount FROM borrower_personal_information JOIN loan_details ON borrower_personal_information.id = loan_details.borrower_id;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT name, address FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_id, name, phone_number FROM borrowers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_type FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT loan_id, issue_date, due_date FROM loans WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT b.name, l.loan_amount FROM borrowers b JOIN loans l ON b.borrower_id = l.borrower_id WHERE l.loan_type = 'Personal Loan';
SELECT * FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation;
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT loan_amount, interest_rate, loan_duration FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT kyc_document_type, kyc_expiry_date FROM KYCCompliance ORDER BY compliance_id DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_status FROM LoanRepayment WHERE repayment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM LoanDetails WHERE interest_rate > 5.0;
SELECT borrower_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM KYCCompliance WHERE kyc_expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM LoanRepayment WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT * FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_url FROM KYCDocuments;
SELECT full_name, address FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation
SELECT borrower_id, email, phone_number FROM BorrowerContactInformation
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_status='approved'

SELECT borrower_id, full_name, date_of_birth, email FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation JOIN BorrowerContactInformation ON BorrowerPersonalInformation.borrower_id = BorrowerContactInformation.borrower_id
SELECT borrower_id, full_name, kyc_completed FROM BorrowerPersonalInformation JOIN KYCStatus ON BorrowerPersonalInformation.borrower_id = KYCStatus.borrower_id AND kyc_completed=true
